name: Wanted Corp.
description: Wanted Corp is a top-down action game in which you play as two intergalactic bounty hunters with different powers. Play solo or with a friend, locally or on-line and team up to survive! The hunt is on!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics card with 512Mb Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible
